name: Plutopoly: customizable✨ monopoly Board Game
description:
Plutopoly is a free customizable monopoly business dice board game with local or online multiplayer support. It has a custom board game maker studio to play your custom maps with friends! You can trade and rent properties, invest in the stock market, build houses, get random events and become king of the board! Have online or local multiplayer fun.

It also supports extensions to make your game more interesting like:

* 🏦 Banking: get loans and interests
* 💰 Stocks: buy in the world stocks
* 🌊 Drain the lake: add a street to the map
* 🚆Transportation: move between your trainstations
* & more coming
You can play locally, with or without board, or online against friends. 

You can change more than 10 settings or create a totally custom board game.

Have fun!
